description: This module examines current theories, models and management approaches in the field of digital marketing communication. Students will use real-world case studies to learn how to stand out in the marketplace by examining digital marketing campaigns from successful corporations. Students will also learn to utilise digital tools and social media, online reviews, blogs, paid search, digital advertising, and online promotions in marketing activities. Upon completing this module, students will have advanced knowledge and skills to apply marketing communication concepts through digital media and technologies.
title: Digital Marketing Practices
